item.title: Anti semetic grafitti, 12th October
item.description:
Yet again after recently reporting and it being removed more anti semetic grafitti has appeared on this white wall. There really are some terribly minded people in this area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1,3, Robin Way, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Offensive graffiti, 12th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Well Hall, London

item.title: Anti semetic grafitti, 12th October
item.description:
Yet again, only a matter of days of reporting it again, and it being remedied, anti semetic hate graffiti has reappeared. This area really does have some terribly minded people

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Curtismill Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Neighbours dumping mattress and shelves, 12th October
item.description:
Over the past few months neighbours have dumped a mattress, a trike and shelves next to but not in the bins. the mattress moved from the front of the flats to the bin space. foxes have started to live there and defecste on the bin lids where you need to touch them to open them. The bins near the flat have been filled in one weekend by someone moving out. There is a bag of dog poo in the parking spaces open with flies on it. This dumping means there is no space to stand to actually put rubbish into the bin. I have been away all weekend and more than anything it is upsetting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Highview Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Youths hanging around in park after closing, 12th October
item.description:
Youths have been in the park quite regularly after closing recently in Butterfield Green playground. Can hear noise after 9pm and rubbish often left there
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cowper Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of building bricks along the road, 12th October
item.description:
Its been there for almost a month and its stopping people from parking anywhere. It's also just on the corner of the road. Someone came from the council a few weeks ago and said they'd give them a deadline to move it, and its still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103,105, Woodside Lane, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins in wrong place & fly tipping, 12th October
item.description:
Near no 1 vambery rd - there is a tree on the pavement. No 20 vernham road consistently leave their bins there. Obstructive to the pavement. Shouldn't even be there - should be outside their house. I have complained about this before. And now several boxes and rubbish bags been fly tipped. Now obstruction and health and safety risk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vambery Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of rubbish and fly tipping, 12th October
item.description:
Rubbish and fly-tipping are growing problems , make community look untidy. people illegally dump waste, such as furniture, household rubbish, or building materials, instead of disposing of it properly. This can cause pollution, attract pests, and create health risks. Blocking the pavement in Bellingham Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellingham Road, Catford South, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Box of concrete powder spilled onto the pavement, 12th October
item.description:
The spilled concrete powder has been there for at least three weeks and it still has not been cleaned. Please remove and clean the pavement as soon as possible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public urination outside Halo Nursery, 12th October
item.description:
People drink in public on the benches outside Halo Nursery and urinate onto the flat block above. Please install a sign that public urination is illegal.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Haggerston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Irkbeck Hill SE21 outside number 7 is a Lambeth green, 12th October
item.description:
Birkbeck Hill SE21 outside number 7 is a Lambeth green powder coated metal cycle locker which is graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Hill, Tulse Hill, London
